mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM PKP.T_SRV_COMBINATEBILL_TOTAL t WHERE t.customerlablenum=#{customerLableNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into PKP.T_SRV_COMBINATEBILL_TOTAL (ID, ERPLOGISTICID, ARRIVESTORENUM, CUSTOMERLABLENUM, ORDERSOURCE, CUSTOMERCODE, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_MOBILE, SENDER_PHONE, SENDER_PROVINCE, SENDER_CITY, SENDER_COUNTY, SENDER_STREET, SENDER_ADDRESS, VISTRECEIVE, BUSINESSNETWORKNAME, BUSINESSNETWORKNO, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_MOBILE, RECEIVER_PHONE, RECEIVER_PROVINCE, RECEIVER_CITY, RECEIVER_COUNTY, RECEIVER_STREET, RECEIVER_ADDRESS, TRANSPORTTYPE, PAYTYPE, CARGONAME, TOTALNUMBER, WEIGHT, VOLUME, GOODS_SIZE, PACKAGESERVICE, INSURANCEVALUE, BACKSIGNBILL, DELIVERYTYPE, SMSNOTIFY, GMTCOMMIT, FOSS_SYSTIME, REMARK) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{erpLogisticID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrivedStoreNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerLableNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender.county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender.street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vistReceive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessNetworkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessNetworkNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver.county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver.street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cargoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backSignBill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsNotify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCommit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
